title: Best of The Herd: 03/28/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 03/28/2019
description:
Colin says the NFL made an emotional decision to change replay rules and emotional decisions never work.  He thinks Kobe Bryant used Hollywood after his career and Hollywood is using LeBron in the middle of his.  Plus, Albert Breer of The MMQB talks about the Patriots attempts to trade for Antonio Brown and OBJ.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
